domains.title: 25.2 Data protection by design and by default. Measures shall ensure that by default personal data are not made accessible without the individual’s intervention to an indefinite number of natural persons.

controls.title: EBS snapshots shared with other AWS accounts
ElastiCache clusters are not using default ports
ElastiCache clusters are in a VPC
Elasticsearch domains are not publicly accessible
Elasticsearch domains are in a VPC
RDS instances are not publicly accessible
RDS instances are not using the default port
RDS snapshots are not publicly accessible
Redshift clusters are not publicly accessible
Redshift clusters are not using the default port
Redshift clusters are in a VPC
S3 bucket WRITE access for everyone
S3 buckets WRITE access for authenticated users
S3 bucket READ access for everyone
S3 bucket READ access for authenticated users
S3 bucket READ_ACP access for everyone
S3 bucket READ_ACP access for authenticated users
S3 bucket WRITE_ACP access for everyone
S3 bucket WRITE_ACP access for authenticated users
S3 bucket FULL_CONTROL for everyone
S3 bucket FULL_CONTROL access for authenticated users
S3 bucket public access block
S3 buckets that are publicy accessible

domains.title: GDPR 30.1. Records of processing activities. Each controller and, where applicable, the controller’s representative, shall maintain a record of processing activities under its responsibility.

controls.title: CloudFront logging is enabled
CloudTrail logging is enabled
CloudTrail log file validation is enabled
ELB logging is enabled
Redshift cluster logging is enabled
VPC flow logs are enabled

domains.title: GDPR 32.1a. Security of processing. Pseudonymisation and encryption of personal data.

controls.title: Upcoming ACM certificate expiration (30 days)
Upcoming ACM certificate expiration (7 days)
Expired ACM certificates
Cloudfront: Requests to origin are encrypted
Cloudfront: Field-level encryption is enabled
Cloudfront: Viewer requests are encrypted
CloudTrail logs storage buckets are encrypted
DynamoDB tables are encrypted
EBS snapshots are encrypted
EBS volumes are encrypted
Elasticsearch domains are encrypted
RDS database instances are encrypted
Redshift clusters are encrypted
S3 bucket default encryption at-rest enabled

domains.title: GDPR: 32.1b. Security of processing. Ability to ensure the ongoing confidentiality, integrity, availability and resilience of processing systems and services.

controls.title: Unrestricted access to RDP port from Internet
Unrestricted access to PostgreSQL Database Server port from Internet
Unrestricted access to Elasticsearch port from Internet
Unrestricted access to HTTP port from Internet
Unrestricted access to HTTPS port from Internet
Unrestricted access to MongoDB port from Internet
Unrestricted access to MSSQL port from Internet
Unrestricted access to MySQL port from Internet
Unrestricted access to Oracle port from Internet
Unrestricted access to SSH port from Internet
CloudFront distributions use >= TLS v1.1
ELB has secure SSL protocols
ELB listeners use secure protocols
ELB listeners use TLSv1.2
ELB security policy does not contain any insecure ciphers
ELB load balancers that are internet facing
ELB load balancer is using the latest security policy
Redshift clusters do not use the default master user name
Redshift clusters are set to require SSL
Key rotation enabled for customer-managed AWS KMS keys
SNS Topics are encrypted
SNS Topics are not publicly accessible
SQS Queue are encrypted

domains.title: GDPR 32.1c. Security of processing. Ability to restore the availability and access to personal data in a timely manner in the event of a physical or technical incident.

controls.title: S3 buckets have versioning enabled
